message_1: Consider a transposition cipher in which every 5th letter of the original message is moved to the front of the message. If the original message is "MATHEMATICSISEASY", what is the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "MATHEMATICSISEASY" using the transposition cipher described, we will move every 5th letter to the front of the message.

Original message: MATHEMATICSISEASY
5th letters: MCIY

Remaining letters: ATHEMATSSSEAS

Now, we place the 5th letters at the beginning of the message:

Encrypted message: MCIYATHEMATSSSEAS
